source.ea120d9a:
from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score
accuracies=cross_val_score(estimator=classifier, X=x_train, y=y_train,cv=10)
print("accuracies: {:.2f} %".format(accuracies.mean()*100)) ## Mean of 10 accuracies
print("Standard Deviation: {:.2f} %".format(accuracies.std()*100)) ## Mean of 10 accuracies
